conclusion: Define symbols for variables like distance, speed, magnetic field, resistances, friction coefficient, mass, and gravity.
Calculate induced emf in the moving rod as ε = B ℓ v.
Determine the total resistance in the circuit as R_total = R + r and calculate the current I = B ℓ v / (R + r).
Calculate the magnetic force on the rod as F_m = B² ℓ² v / (R + r).
Establish that the external force F_ext balances the magnetic force and kinetic friction: F_ext = F_m + μ m g.
Calculate the electrical power dissipated in the resistor R as P_R = (B ℓ v)² R / (R + r)².
